title: Accenture | Advanced Associate Software Engineer | Bangalore
content:
**Education:** Bachelor's in Information Technology

**Years of Experience:** 0 [Fresher]

**Date of the Offer:** 26th September

**Company:** Accenture

**Title/Level:** Packaged App Development Associate

**Location:** Bangalore, India

**Salary:** INR 5,41,500 (Annual fixed compensation)

**Relocation/Signing Bonus:** Joining Bonus of INR 50,000

**Stock bonus:** N/A

**Bonus:** Individual Performance Bonus (IPB) - Max annual variable pay-out INR 46,000

**Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):** INR 6,60,700 (Annual Total Earning Potential + Additional Notional Benefits)

**Benefits:** Gratuity, Notional Insurance Premium paid by Company

**Other details:** Relocation may be required; Work in 24X7 shifts based on business requirements
salaryTotal: : Inr 6,60,700 (annual Total Earning Potential + Additional Notional Benefits)

title: Groupon | SDE 2 | Bangalore
